mapper.update: create table if not exists questionnaire_table ( quesid int unsigned auto_increment primary key, title varchar(100) not null, content varchar(400) not null, publisher varchar(100) not null, reward int not null, attend int not null, endtime varchar(100) not null, request varchar(400) not null, status varchar(40) not null )ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
mapper.insert: insert into quesTable (quesID, title, content, publisher, reward, attend, total, endtime, request,status) values (${quesID},"${title}", "${content}","${publisher}",${reward},${attend}, ${total},"${endtime}", "${request}","${status}")
mapper.select: select content from quesTable where quesID = #{quesID}
